Name: Air Attack VR
About the game: Welcome to 'Air Attack', an arcade avia/auto simulator! Take personal control of a fighter/armored vehicle, perform various missions, upgrade the equipment available. Explore the territory, capture all enemy bases. Your motto: 'Only one will remain!' Exciting aerial and ground battles await you, an upgrade system for all available vehicles, a dangerous enemy, and an adrenaline rush! - Territory Reconnaissance; - Air/ground battles; - Capturing enemy bases; - Equipment upgrades

Meta Description: Looking for information on Air Attack VR? Check out the release date (Jan 18, 2023), developer insights from Evvacon, and a complete game summary.
